name: TROUGH SPACE
description:
Controls:

move with left and right arrow and shoot with X/V and reset the game with C/Z start with pressing X and C or Z and V

Rules:

you are a small green rocket that can shoot small green projectiles with the cooldown is 1 second there are for types of enemyes basic, speedy, havy, heal your max HP is 3 and score is just for you to know how good you are

Reason for this game:

it is just a demo of a game that I will do latter the newer version will have more enemys bosses and cool items

Credits:

XFajk - Rudolf Vrbensky: art, code, sound effects, play tester

Hexa : play tester
